title: Nižný Hrušov
text:
Nižný Hrušov () is a <a href="village">village</a> and <a href="municipality">municipality</a> in <a href="Vranov%20nad%20Top%C4%BEou%20District">Vranov nad Topľou District</a> in the <a href="Pre%C5%A1ov%20Region">Prešov Region</a> of eastern <a href="Slovakia">Slovakia</a>.
History.
In <a href="history">historical records</a> the village was first mentioned in 1254.
Geography.
The <a href="municipality">municipality</a> lies at an <a href="altitude">altitude</a> of 130 metres and covers an <a href="area">area</a> of 18.47 km². It has a <a href="population">population</a> of about 1,665 people.
